alert.note: Alert for Florence; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Florence, west central Georgetown and Williamsburg Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Gourdin, or 12 miles southwest of Kingstree, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Kingstree, Andrews, Timmonsville, Cades, Cartersville, Indiantown, Earle, Hebron, Morrisville, New Hope, Trio, Warsaw, Salters, Sardis, Effingham, Gourdin, Lambert and Scranton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 140 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 148 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
